Title: Anyway, I Started Bribing
Description:
The scoundrel! I had a deal with Arty to market the crystals in the paper. Someone must've cut a bigger deal with him.

Arty routinely inspects the Venture Company's working area on the shore. He always brings his own guards, but no one is immune to gold in Booty Bay.

Take my last bit of gold. Go to the oil rigs and bribe the guards to look the other way before you confront Arty.
ObjectivesText: Use the gold to bribe Arty's Hired Bodyguards and then confront Prospector Arty in Wild Shore.
